title: Update Subscription Payment Method
description: A customer's credit card on file for their subscription has expired. They need to update it.

tasks.description: The system sends an automated email to the customer warning them their payment method is about to expire.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer is proactively notified of the issue.

tasks.description: The customer logs into their account and navigates to the payment methods section for their subscription.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer accesses the correct page to update their card.

tasks.description: The customer adds their new credit card information and sets it as the default for the subscription.
tasks.expected_outcome: The payment method is successfully updated, ensuring no interruption in their subscription service.
